verses.content: “Nangni lai zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amanih an hung um a, inchikna amanih, thilmak amanih an inentir cheu a,
inchikna amanih, thilmak ama- nih an inentir cheu chu a hung tlung a, in hriet ngai naw, ‘Pathien dang zui ei tiu khai, an rawng bâwl ei tiu,’ in kuoma an ti chun,

chu zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amanih thuhai chu in pawm ding a ni nawh; LALPA in Pathien chun in lungril po po le in hringna po poin LALPA in Pathien chu in hmangai le hmangai naw ti hriet fiena dingin a fie cheu a ni lem.
LALPA in Pathien chu zui in ta, ama chu ṭîng in ta, a rawng dâm bâwl in ta, ama chu in chel tlat ding a nih.

Chun, chu zâwlnei amanih, mang neitu amani chu sukhlum ding a nih. Aigupta rama inthawka ṭhuoisuoka, suoka inthawka intlantu cheu LALPA in Pathienin hraw ding thu a pêk cheu lampuia inthawka pêthmang dinga, LALPA in Pathien chunga helna thu a hril leiin. Chuong ang chun nangni laia thil ṭha naw chu in sukbo ding a nih.

“I unaupa, i nu naupa amanih, i naupa amanih, i naunu amanih, i nuhmei pawmlai amanih, i ruol ṭhatak khawmin inrûka, “Pathien dang rawng bâwl ei tiu khai’ tih a nang amanih, i pa amanih khawma in hriet naw,
hnam dang in kâwl vêl hnaia mi amanih, in hlat deua mi amanih, kâwlkawdawnga inthawka kâwl- kawdawng khingtieng chena mi pathienhai be dinga an zâwr cheu a, an thlêm cheu chun;
in remtipui ding a ni nawh a, in pawm ding a ni bawk nawh; in lunginsiet ding a ni nawh a, hla khawm in hla ding a ni nawh a, in thup ding a ni nawh;
in sukhlum ngei ngei lem ding a na; a sukhlum dingin kut thlâk hmasâng i ta, chu hnunga chun mipui po poin,
Lungin in dêng hlum ding a nih; Aigupta rama inthawka suoka inthawka ṭhuoi suoktu cheu LALPA in Pathien kuoma inthawk a suk- pêtna cheu a zawng leiin.
Chuongchun, Israel mi po po chun hrieng an ta, ṭîng an ta, nangni lai chuonga rîtlo hrim hrim chu chîng ta naw ni hai.
“LALPA in Pathienin in umna dinga a pêk cheu in khaw pakhata chun,
nangni laia mi dukdaklo ṭhen- khat hung suokin, chu khawpuia mihai chu in hriet ngai lo pathien danghai be dingin an ṭhuoi hmang ti thu hril in hriet chun,
ṭhahnemngaitakin indawn vêl unla, zawng suok ro; chun, ngai ta u, thudik a lo nih a, chuong anga thil tirdakum nangni laia thaw a ni hriet chieng a ni chun,
kâwlhnâmin chu khuoa umhai chu in sukhlum ngei ngei ding a nih; a sûnga um po pohai, ran ruolhai leh kâwlhnâmin in sukbohmang vawng ding a nih.

Râllâk sum po po chu khaw- laiah la khâwm in ta; chun, khuo le râllâk sum po po chu LALPA in Pathien kuomah pumrawhmang thil- inhlân dingin râwng in ta, pil pâwng el ni kumkhuo tâng a tih, inngîr ni nâwk ta ngai naw nih.

Râllâk sum chu a ieng ieng khawm in tâwk ding a ni nawh, LALPA chun a lungsenna nasatak chu inlet a ta, zângaina inhmutir a ti cheu a, lunginsiet a ti cheu a, a suk- pung ding cheu a nih; in pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâm ta ang khan;
LALPA in Pathien mithmua thilṭha thaw dinga thupêk po po tuta ka pêk cheu hi in zâwm phawt chun.
